articles.author: Kieran King
articles.title: Top 10 highest-paid athletes as Cristiano Ronaldo pips Lionel Messi and Lewis Hamilton misses out - The Mirror
articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo has overtaken Lionel Messi as the best-paid active athlete in the world with basketball superstar LeBron James dropping outside the top three behind Kylian Mbappe
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo has been named as the highest-paid athlete in Forbes' 2023 rich list. 
 Ronaldo, 38, has leapfrogged Lionel Messi and LeBron James into top spot following his big-money move to Al-… [+3920 chars]
